title: AI Assistant
subtitle: Intelligent operations assistant to help you solve problems quickly

responses.default: I'm your AI operations assistant. How can I help you?
responses.createPlane: I can help you create a new plane. Please tell me the basic information about the plane.
responses.entityRelation: Let me analyze the entity relationship graph for you.
responses.healthMonitor: Let me check the system health status.
responses.dependency: Let me analyze the dependencies between planes.
responses.reportGeneration: I can generate a detailed system report for you.
responses.sequenceManagement: Let me help you manage sequence processes.
responses.tagManagement: I can assist you with tag management.
responses.aiAgent: I'm happy to answer questions about AI agents.
